pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computing Variances and Covariances, Visualization and Missing Data Solution for Multivariate Meta-Analysis // Collection of functions to compute covariances for different effect sizes, data visualization, and single and multiple imputation for missing data. Effect sizes include correlation (r), mean difference (MD), standardized mean difference (SMD), log odds ratio (logOR), log risk ratio (logRR), and risk difference (RD).
